Summary: Bright white disc moving very fast at low altitude
trends: There has been one other sighting in Poole
There were no other sightings in Poole on or around June 30th 0001
divs: Sighting DetailsLocation X403900 m Y92400 m504352N, 15645WGrid RefSZ039923accurate to 100 metresDate 06Jan2004Description At about 8pm on I stepped out of my shed no it wasnt full ofthinners fumesfacing towards my house and a movement above me and to my leftcaught my eye.As I looked up there was a single bright-white as bright as the moon, and alsodue to the perspective it appeared to be about the same size as the moonappeared last nightdisc which was moving away from me at an altitude whichtook it just into the sporadic low cloud cover, but still remaining visible. Soit was at a fairly low altitude.In the space of about 1 second it travelled from just above me in a Northeasterly direction it was coming over and past me and into the distance inlanduntil it was out of visual range. So it was moving very, very fast in a totallysmooth trajectory.It was silent.
